title: [Medicine] Robust T cell immunity in convalescent individuals with asymptomatic or mild COVID-19 - SARS-CoV-2 elicits robust, broad and highly functional memory T cell responses, suggesting that natural exposure or infection may prevent recurrent episodes of severe COVID-19. (Cell, 14 August 2020)

[Medicine] Italian males recovering from mild COVID-19 show no evidence of SARS-CoV-2 in semen despite prolonged nasopharyngeal swab positivity, which seem to indicate that sexual transmission of SARS-CoV-2 by men recovering from mild symptoms of COVID-19 is highly unlikely. (IJIR, 14 August 2020)
